items.sentence: You weren\'t supposed to come here, were you?
I can\'t seem to get him to fix this machine.
I didn\'t know Tom was going skiing with you.
I thought Tom would have forgotten me by now.
I thought Tom would stay overnight in Boston.
I thought Tom would take Mary out for dinner.
It didn\'t take very long for Tom to do that.
I\'ll be counting on you to bring the drinks.
I\'ll be in Boston for the next three months.
Tom was sitting under a tree, reading a book.
Writing a short, concise report is difficult.
I don\'t want to make the same mistake again.
Tom\'s new house is still under construction.
I don\'t really want to go swimming with you.
I don\'t think that Tom would leave his wife.
Tom probably thought I wasn\'t able to drive.
I just wanted to know if you were in trouble.
Please try to talk Tom into joining our team.
Pretty much everyone is doing the same thing.
My schedule is tight for the next three days.
